nodes.bodyText: Do we need a size limit here?
nodes.diffHunk:

     all_status_sections = [

     ] if self._bundle_process_cache else []
+
     all_status_sections.append(thread_dump())
+    if self._enable_heap_dump:
+      all_status_sections.append(heap_dump())
